Description: Secure and highly available web application infrastructure with multi-AZ deployment, encryption, and monitoring

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Suffix for the environment (e.g., dev, prod)

NotificationEmail.Description: Email address for CloudWatch alarm notifications (optional)

SSLCertificateArn.Description: ARN of SSL certificate for ALB HTTPS listener (optional - leave empty to use HTTP only)

UseMultipleNATGateways.Description: Whether to use multiple NAT Gateways for high availability (increases cost)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm when CPU is below threshold
Alarm when ALB response time is high

DatabaseSecretArn.Description: ARN of the AWS-managed secret containing database credentials
